channel.title: About on Stars and the Underground
channel.description: Recent content in About on Stars and the Underground

item.description: My name is John Mason and I am a singer songwriter based in Auckland, New Zealand my music inhabits the Post Punk, Shoe Gaze, and Dark Electronic genres. I cut my musical teeth in a band called “Winterland” formed with Mike Caulfield in the early 2000s we released two EPs and an album and a video. We played Sweetwaters, the 95bFM Summer Series, Club Bizarre's Vampyre and Nocturne Balls, and Mediatrix's The Darkness Gathering received nationwide radio airplay for several tracks.
